00079 void DotVisualizer::printGraph(){
00080         LOG(DEBUG) << "DotVisualizer: Printing graph to file.";
00081         scene->executeGraphTraverser(&graphPrinter, scene->getRootId());
00082 //      std::cout << graphPrinter.getDotGraph() << std::endl << std::endl;
00083 
00084         /* Save a svg file as snapshopt */
00085         std::string fileName = "current_graph.gv";
00086         output.open(fileName.c_str(), std::ios::trunc);
00087         output << graphPrinter.getDotGraph();
00088         output.flush();
00089         output.close();
00090         system("dot current_graph.gv -Tsvg -o current_graph.gv.svg"); //e.g. with gthumb you can observe changes...
00091 
00092         if(keepHistory) {
00093                 std::stringstream command;
00094                 command.str("");
00095 
00096                 command << "cp current_graph.gv.svg graph_" << counter << ".gv.svg";
00097                 system(command.str().c_str());
00098                 command.str("");
00099                 command << "cp current_graph.gv graph_" << counter << ".gv";
00100                 system(command.str().c_str());
00101                 LOG(DEBUG) << "DotVisualizer:   File name is: graph_" << counter << ".gv.svg";
00102         }
00103 
00104         graphPrinter.reset();
00105         counter++;
00106 }
00107 
00108 
00109 };
